Using Ripe

Source: vignettes/ripe.Rmd
ripe.Rmd
library(ripe)

replicate


stats::runif(20)%>%
  ripe(replicate,n=2,simplify=FALSE)
#> [[1]]
#>  [1] 0.25819317 0.95025976 0.06569836 0.46449502 0.03830340 0.27981552
#>  [7] 0.85633095 0.85667621 0.33579318 0.26426483 0.85690997 0.94849284
#> [13] 0.33853311 0.53246510 0.61728735 0.15569474 0.80078841 0.69916283
#> [19] 0.55680923 0.27551870
#> 
#> [[2]]
#>  [1] 0.296252949 0.295250942 0.712386617 0.281501424 0.380722190 0.860476154
#>  [7] 0.781799658 0.004951691 0.344767542 0.057257134 0.242638791 0.771768455
#> [13] 0.114509302 0.680469247 0.752525878 0.848973031 0.117136529 0.698450883
#> [19] 0.038171759 0.508166395

stats::runif(20)%>%
  sample(10)%>%
  ripe(replicate,n=3,simplify=FALSE)
#> [[1]]
#>  [1] 0.946003205 0.792798437 0.460004074 0.282428942 0.003655241 0.175671992
#>  [7] 0.260728651 0.877311965 0.775418068 0.011412448
#> 
#> [[2]]
#>  [1] 0.32172741 0.52324683 0.03936423 0.90746007 0.31753677 0.27408795
#>  [7] 0.10667990 0.91739677 0.63029126 0.51661033
#> 
#> [[3]]
#>  [1] 0.9264152 0.4847251 0.4079441 0.8977945 0.6462082 0.7051955 0.5960759
#>  [8] 0.4002593 0.9971094 0.7154160

stats::runif(20)%>%
  sample(10)%>%
  utils::head(5)%>%
  ripe(replicate,n=4,simplify=FALSE)
#> [[1]]
#> [1] 0.38010470 0.04228707 0.85154410 0.60673838 0.69875557
#> 
#> [[2]]
#> [1] 0.8133943 0.9695806 0.1316779 0.2130101 0.8104882
#> 
#> [[3]]
#> [1] 0.7002190 0.8990144 0.8422036 0.7163388 0.1964447
#> 
#> [[4]]
#> [1] 0.04340052 0.56618030 0.95347943 0.37825893 0.88890704

apply

stats::runif(20)%>%
  sample(10)%>%
  utils::head(5)%>%
  ripe(lapply, X=1:4)
#> [[1]]
#> [1] 0.1844698 0.7396110 0.5575952 0.5635989 0.9330127
#> 
#> [[2]]
#> [1] 0.95396092 0.67295900 0.96636352 0.82451825 0.09725742
#> 
#> [[3]]
#> [1] 0.53736964 0.58817913 0.47987511 0.05917463 0.91190142
#> 
#> [[4]]
#> [1] 0.20354998 0.34070487 0.73805409 0.02972618 0.44962005

mclapply

(ncores <- parallel::detectCores())
#> [1] 4
stats::runif(20)%>%
  sample(10)%>%
  utils::head(5)%>%
  ripe(parallel::mclapply, X=1:4, mc.cores = pmin(1,ncores-1))
#> [[1]]
#> [1] 0.4217784 0.7981639 0.2682232 0.7808195 0.2259492
#> 
#> [[2]]
#> [1] 0.4848479 0.6380295 0.3004192 0.1336075 0.8538573
#> 
#> [[3]]
#> [1] 0.9783694 0.5901458 0.4495605 0.8681861 0.4972718
#> 
#> [[4]]
#> [1] 0.7415819 0.4498624 0.5464913 0.3348376 0.4070080

purrr

iris %>% 
  dplyr::sample_n(5) %>% 
  ripe(purrr::rerun,.n=3)
#> [[1]]
#>   Sepal.Length Sepal.Width Petal.Length Petal.Width    Species
#> 1          5.7         3.0          4.2         1.2 versicolor
#> 2          7.6         3.0          6.6         2.1  virginica
#> 3          4.9         3.6          1.4         0.1     setosa
#> 4          4.9         2.4          3.3         1.0 versicolor
#> 5          5.3         3.7          1.5         0.2     setosa
#> 
#> [[2]]
#>   Sepal.Length Sepal.Width Petal.Length Petal.Width    Species
#> 1          5.9         3.0          4.2         1.5 versicolor
#> 2          6.9         3.1          5.1         2.3  virginica
#> 3          6.4         2.8          5.6         2.1  virginica
#> 4          5.8         2.7          5.1         1.9  virginica
#> 5          7.2         3.0          5.8         1.6  virginica
#> 
#> [[3]]
#>   Sepal.Length Sepal.Width Petal.Length Petal.Width    Species
#> 1          6.2         3.4          5.4         2.3  virginica
#> 2          6.5         3.0          5.5         1.8  virginica
#> 3          4.4         3.2          1.3         0.2     setosa
#> 4          6.4         2.8          5.6         2.2  virginica
#> 5          6.1         3.0          4.6         1.4 versicolor

iris %>% 
  dplyr::select(1:2) %>% 
  dplyr::sample_n(20) %>% 
  ripe(purrr::rerun,.n=1)
#> [[1]]
#>    Sepal.Length Sepal.Width
#> 1           6.4         2.8
#> 2           4.5         2.3
#> 3           6.3         2.7
#> 4           5.2         3.5
#> 5           4.6         3.1
#> 6           4.7         3.2
#> 7           4.3         3.0
#> 8           6.7         3.1
#> 9           6.4         2.8
#> 10          5.5         2.4
#> 11          5.8         4.0
#> 12          6.8         3.0
#> 13          5.1         3.5
#> 14          5.6         3.0
#> 15          5.5         3.5
#> 16          6.8         3.2
#> 17          5.5         2.5
#> 18          6.1         2.6
#> 19          6.2         2.2
#> 20          4.8         3.4

iris %>% 
  dplyr::select(1:2)%>% 
  dplyr::sample_n(20) %>% 
  dplyr::slice(1:5) %>%
  ripe(purrr::rerun,.n=3)
#> [[1]]
#>   Sepal.Length Sepal.Width
#> 1          6.9         3.1
#> 2          5.4         3.9
#> 3          5.0         3.2
#> 4          5.0         2.0
#> 5          4.4         2.9
#> 
#> [[2]]
#>   Sepal.Length Sepal.Width
#> 1          6.4         3.2
#> 2          6.3         2.5
#> 3          7.0         3.2
#> 4          5.5         3.5
#> 5          5.2         3.5
#> 
#> [[3]]
#>   Sepal.Length Sepal.Width
#> 1          5.0         3.5
#> 2          6.3         3.3
#> 3          6.3         2.5
#> 4          4.8         3.4
#> 5          5.0         3.4
